    • findObject

      public java.lang.Object findObject​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Object> objects, java.lang.Object object)
      This method checks if a given objects exists in a list of objects. Dynamic Binding is taking place because the entity classes have overridden the equals method of the Object class. Therefore, this function can be used for all entity classes
      Parameters:
      objects - Array List of objects
      object - an object
      Returns:
      objectItem if found else return null

    • checkTimeSanity

      public boolean checkTimeSanity​(java.time.LocalTime startTime, java.time.LocalTime endTime)
      This method ensures that the start time is before end time
      Parameters:
      startTime - the starting time of the registration period
      endTime - the ending time of the registeration period
      Returns:
      boolean True or False

    • checkDateSanity

      startDate - starting date of the registeration period
      endDate - ending date of the registeration period
      Returns:

    • isAccessible

      public boolean isAccessible()
      This functions returns True if both the start time and start date are before end time and end date respectively else it returns false
